\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em The address family for this type of address. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Class that represents an internet (IPv6) address. 

This inherits from the IP-\/specific form of a socket address, {\itshape sockaddr\+\_\+in}.

{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1inet6__address_af2ca54d9b56c8869628c48ccca2a2dec} 
sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::inet6\+\_\+address (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{in\+\_\+port\+\_\+t}]{port}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [explicit]}}



Constructs an address for any iface using the specified port. 

This is a convenient way for a server to specify an address that will bind to all interfaces. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em port} & The port number in native/host byte order. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1inet6__address_a8be947ef4007c3497360e285da4afd64} 
sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::inet6\+\_\+address (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const string \&}]{saddr}{, }\item[{in\+\_\+port\+\_\+t}]{port}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Constructs an address using the name of the host and the specified port. 

This attempts to resolve the host name to an address.

\hline

\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

{\em system\+\_\+error} & if the host name can not be resolved, or any other error occurs. \\

\end{DoxyExceptions}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1inet6__address_aa0a2862627db7369e38c2abf57b1a3af} 
sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::inet6\+\_\+address (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const string \&}]{saddr}{, }\item[{in\+\_\+port\+\_\+t}]{port}{, }\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{error_8h_ab1e0c0347ae112be97a91664fd6c830d}{error\+\_\+code}} \&}]{ec}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [noexcept]}}



Constructs an address using the name of the host and the specified port. 

This attempts to resolve the host name to an address. If the name resolution fails, the error code is set. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}

\hline
{\em port} & The port number in native/host byte order. \\
\hline
{\em ec} & Gets the error code on failure. \\

\end{DoxyParams}

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{is\_set()}{is\_set()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1inet6__address_ab0e38db2d0d5c7706b1b425fc7d55f55} 
bool sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::is\+\_\+set (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption}) const\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [override]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}, {\ttfamily [noexcept]}}



Checks if the address is set to some value. 

This doesn\textquotesingle{}t attempt to determine if the address is valid, simply that it was at least set to an address of this family. \begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
{\itshape true} if the address is set to some value in this family, even if not valid, {\itshape false} if the address is empty. 
\end{DoxyReturn}


Reimplemented from \mbox{\hyperlink{classsockpp_1_1sock__address_ac4e5b06da0efbbc6b8d289e3215f13aa}{sockpp\+::sock\+\_\+address}}.

uint8\+\_\+t sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::operator\mbox{[}$\,$\mbox{]} (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{int}]{i}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption}) const\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}



Gets a byte of the 128-\/bit IPv6 Address. 

Note that the address is normally stored in network byte order. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em i} & The byte to read (0-\/7) \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The specified byte in the 128-\/bit IPv6 Address 
\end{DoxyReturn}

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\_string()}{to\_string()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1inet6__address_a22d87fd2de836ceba082e9721244f810} 
string sockpp\+::inet6\+\_\+address\+::to\+\_\+string (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption}) const}



Gets a printable string for the address. 

This gets the address in the printable form "{}\mbox{[}addr\mbox{]}\+:port"{} using inet\+\_\+ntop(). It does not attempt to find the host name using a lookup. \begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A string representation of the address in the form \textquotesingle{}\mbox{[}address\mbox{]}\+:port\textquotesingle{} 
\end{DoxyReturn}
